title.description: The game title that will be shown to players

author.description: The author name that will be shown to players

description.description: The long-form game description that will be shown to players

website.description: A web URL that will be shown to players

markdown.description: List of glob-style patterns for locating Markdown source files. These are compiled in the order in which they appear.

javascript.description: List of glob-style patterns for locating Javascript files reside. These are imported in the order in which they appear.

assets.description: List of glob-style patterns for locating additional asset files. These are imported in the order in which they appear.

ignore.description: List of glob-style patterns for files to ignore. Ignores are applied when searching for Markdown files, Javascript files, and asset files.

template.description: The HTML template file to use for the final story output

output.description: The folder where the final story files will be saved

outputFormat.description: Options: 'minify' to minify the final story HTML (reduces file size but makes the HTML source much less human-readable), 'prettify' to prettify the final story HTML into human-readable HTML, 'default' for no additional processing

linkTooltips.description: If true, show a tooltip on macro links indicating the macro destination. (Useful for dev, but you probably want to disable it for release.)

linkTags.description: Raw HTML to be inserted at the end of different Fractive link types.

backButtonHTML.description: Raw HTML inserted in the place where the back button is defined to be.
